alert.note: Alert for South Washington Coast (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:55PM PST until February 23 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph near the mouth of Columbia River. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast. In Washington, South Washington Coast. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
